title: How to Style a Grey Cardigan

steps.title: You can wear this outfit almost anywhere at any time.
steps.content: You can wear this outfit almost anywhere at any time. Pair your grey cardigan with a white T-shirt, tank top, button-down, or crop top underneath for a look that pops instantly. [1] X Research source Lighter grey cardigans will blend in with the white color, while darker grey ones will pop against it. You can pair this outfit with some jeans and boots for a fall or winter look. Or, try some khaki shorts and sandals during warmer weather.

steps.title: A plaid shirt will give your look a little visual interest.
steps.content: A plaid shirt will give your look a little visual interest. Try wearing a red, blue, or green plaid shirt under your grey cardigan for a pop of color and pattern. [2] X Research source You can leave your cardigan open to show off your shirt, or you can button it up for a more sophisticated look. Pair your outfit with a beanie to stay cozy during the winter time.

steps.title: Light wash bottoms always look good with a grey cardigan.
steps.content: Light wash bottoms always look good with a grey cardigan. Go for skinny jeans, capris, or even jean shorts to look great every time. [3] X Research source For a more modern look, go for ripped or distressed jeans. Try a vintage outfit with flared jeans and a grey cardigan. Go for cropped jeans that hit at your ankle for an interesting silhouette.

steps.title: Keep your look casual on your day off.
steps.content: Keep your look casual on your day off. Put on a pair of classic black leggings, then pair your outfit with a white T-shirt and your grey cardigan. [4] X Research source This look works best with a longer cardigan that hits just below your bum. Pair your outfit with running shoes and a beanie if it’s cold out.

steps.title: Darker grey cardigans look great with an all-black outfit.
steps.content: Darker grey cardigans look great with an all-black outfit. Try pants and a shirt, a long dress and tights, or a skirt and a button-down with your cardigan on top. [5] X Research source If all black is a little too much for you, go for navy blue instead.

steps.title: Turn heads in an outfit made entirely of grey tones.
steps.content: Turn heads in an outfit made entirely of grey tones. Pair your cardigan with a grey top, grey trousers, and a grey overcoat to hit the art museum or go out to a fancy brunch. [6] X Research source Don’t worry about matching all of your greys—in fact, varying tones will make your outfit look more put together. Add a pop of color with your shoes or a handbag.

steps.title: Pair your cardigan with running shoes or sneakers for a sporty look.
steps.content: Pair your cardigan with running shoes or sneakers for a sporty look. Try wearing leggings, jeans, or a tennis skirt with your cardigan to complete your outfit. [7] X Research source White sneakers always look great with grey, while black or navy ones will blend in more with your outfit. Or, add a pop of color to your look with red, blue, or green sneakers.

steps.title: You can make any outfit a little more fancy with the right shoes.
steps.content: You can make any outfit a little more fancy with the right shoes. Try kitten heels for a day at the office, wedges for a spring evening, or stilettos for a night out on the town. [8] X Research source Black heels always look chic and sophisticated with a grey cardigan.

steps.title: Let your grey cardigan stand out with natural colors.
steps.content: Let your grey cardigan stand out with natural colors. Grab a purse, handbag, or clutch that’s grey, white, or black for the perfect outfit every time. [9] X Research source You could also wear a black satchel or fanny pack for a more modern look. For a casual outfit, try a neutral backpack instead.

steps.title: Grey is a neutral, so you can pair it with almost anything.
steps.content: Grey is a neutral, so you can pair it with almost anything. Make your outfit stand out with pinks, reds, blues, and greens, especially during the spring and summer. [10] X Research source You can also add color in with your handbag or your jewelry.

steps.title: Grab your silver rings, necklaces, and earrings for a perfect outfit.
steps.content: Grab your silver rings, necklaces, and earrings for a perfect outfit. Silver always looks great with grey, and they’re so similar that you almost can’t go wrong. [11] X Research source Make your look feel a little edgier by wearing a chain necklace or a statement necklace. Dress your outfit up with long, dangly earrings, or keep it simple with small studs.
